section.title: Upgrade JBoss Developer Studio BYOE
section.para: It is not possible to upgrade an existing JBoss Developer Studio BYOE to JBoss Developer Studio 7 BYOE because they support different versions of Eclipse. For example, JBoss Developer Studio 6 BYOE supports Eclipse Juno but JBoss Developer Studio 7 BYOE supports Eclipse Kepler.
To use JBoss Developer Studio 7 BYOE, you must upgrade to Eclipse Kepler and install JBoss Developer Studio 7 BYOE from Eclipse Marketplace.
